system.description:
Chief. God.

Or perhaps, one of His many avatars. Lion-headed. Eyes of exploding stars. Bleeding azure. It's up to you to find out what this is.

Granted the power of Creation.

(The stats provided here is for a Rank 1 encounter with 4 Kadungganan. Check the book for higher ranks.)

traits.name: Poise
traits.description: Whenever a Chief suffers a Status Effect or is forcibly moved, they can choose to ignore it and gain a Poise Token instead. When they gain 5 Poise Tokens, they become Poise Broken: they can suffer all Status Effects, can be forcibly moved as normal, and cannot gain any more Poise Tokens. While Poise Broken, a Chief loses 1 Poise Token whenever they start their riff. When they lose all Poise Tokens, they lose Poise Broken and can again gain Poise Tokens.

traits.name: Dragon Eye
traits.description: Chiefs can riff a number of times per Resound equal to the Kadungganan.

traits.name: Glory To The Sidereal Banner
traits.description: Pale steal holy items from the places they colonize. All Pale fighters have +2d to all Attacks and Defenses, though they lose these for the rest of violence the first time they're Staggered.

traits.name: This Land Of Tears
traits.description: The Pale get stronger as they are Staggered, however, as they worship that bleeding god. When Staggered, they gain +1 to Speed and +1 to Jump, and Block 1. They get extra benefits as well.

traits.name: Diamond Body
traits.description: The Demiurge is immune to all attacks if they have at least 2 allies adjacent to them. They are also immune to gaining any Poise Tokens and only gain Poise Tokens whenever a Slave in the battlefield is Defeated.

traits.name: Creative Power
traits.description: The Demiurge may summon 1 Slave in the battlefield every start of their riff. As long as there are Slaves in the field, the Demiurge cannot be Defeated.

traits.name: Perfect Son of Chaos, Taker of Gnosis
traits.description: The Demiurge is permanently floating Whenever they gain Poise Tokens, inflict 1 Hit on all enemies in the battlefield, and heal 1, 1/Riff

system.attacks:
Inflict Violence: Fiat Lux. Attack an enemy in range 6 with Faith, then mark them until the end of their next riff. While marked, all attacks against them gain +2d.

Gambits [[/r d12]]

Prophet (Phase 1)

1-6: Rush > Inflict Violence > Inflict Violence

7-12: Rush > Inflict Violence > Shield of Conviction [1]: Give Block 1 to all slaves in the battlefield and inflict -1 Defenses to all enemies in burst 3.

Yaldabaoth (Phase 2): The God reveals more of itself. This triggers at HP 0: they heal to full HP again and become Size 3.

1-3: Rush > Inflict Violence > Inflict Violence

4-6: Rush > Inflict Violence > Shield of Conviction [1]: Give Block 1 to all slaves in the battlefield and inflict -1 Defenses to all enemies in burst 3.

7-9: Inflict Violence > Big Bang [1]: Stun all enemies in burst 2 > Sword of Justice [1]: All slaves in burst 3 may inflict violence.

10-11: Teleport 4 > Hosanna! [1]: The Demiurge's and all slaves' next attack gains Overwhelming, Skewering, and are True. > Inflict Violence

12: Give Your Bodies To God For Greater Apocalypsis [3]: All allies in the battlefield are Defeated, and the Demiurge heals 1 per defeated Ally, and then inflict 3 True Hits to all enemies adjacent to the Demiurge and each Defeated ally.
